full_summary:
**Bid Notice Announcment** 
=================================

### Tender Reference Information

*   Title: Snow and Ice removal from Parliament Hill Buildings
*   Solicitation Number: WS4583770463
*   Reference Number: WS4583770463-Doc4617613081

### Event Information

*   Publication Date: June 6, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: August 21, 2024, 2:00 p.m. DST
*   Amendment Date: June 6, 2024

### Service Description

Canada is seeking offers for the supply and performance of labor, materials, and equipment to carry out snow and ice removal from roofs on Parliament Hill buildings in Ottawa.

### Tender Details

*   Performance Period: Indefinite, subject to notice.
*   Site Visit: July 3, 2024, 10:00 a.m.
*   Mandatory Site Attendance: Required for all eligible bidders.
*   Bid Submission Deadline: August 21, 2024, 2:00 p.m. DST
*   Bid Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price.

### Trade Agreements

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)    
    11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
